meanings.def: down the stairs; on or to a floor of a house or building lower than the one you are on, especially the one at ground level
examples: I couldn't sleep so I went downstairs and watched TV.
She rushed downstairs and burst into the kitchen.

meanings.def: on a floor of a house or building lower than the one you are on, especially the one at ground level
examples: I knocked on the door of my downstairs neighbour.

meanings.def: the lower floor of a house or building, especially the one at ground level
